item.title: BIDEN RESIGNS?: DNC Mafia KILLS Biden's Re-Election Campaign, Taps VP COMMIE-la Harris [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 25, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty post-mortem Joe Biden's aborted re-election campaign and the rise of VP COMMIE-la Harris.

Segment 1 - News Brief:
"Sexual Assault Charge Against Megachurch Pastor Bruxy Cavey Stayed Over Delays" | The Star:
https://www.thestar.com/news/investigations/sexual-assault-charge-against-megachurch-pastor-bruxy-cavey-stayed-over-delays/article_3973397a-4839-11ef-8c89-6391a1198e72.html;
"Worldwide Microsoft Outage Impacts Airports, Banks, TV Broadcasts" | Western Standard:
https://www.westernstandard.news/news/worldwide-microsoft-outage-impacts-airports-banks-tv-broadcasts/56173;
"KFC Bans Pork, Offers Halal Chicken to Make Soul Food Menu More Diverse and Inclusive in Canada" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/kfc-bans-pork-offers-halal-chicken-to-make-soul-food-menu-more-diverse-and-inclusive-in-canada;
"Canada is Now the Car Theft Capital of the World: Report" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canada-is-now-the-car-theft-capital-of-the-world-report?utm_content=;

Segment 2 - 2024 PRIDE COMES BEFORE THE FALL RECAP:

"Maze Moore's Tweet on Biden" | Twitter: https://x.com/mazemoore/status/1806556780979175820;
"Charlie Kirk's Tweet on Biden" | Twitter: https://x.com/charliekirk11/status/1811795013208277145;
"Biden Letter to Withdraw Harris Endorsement" | NPR: https://www.npr.org/2024/07/21/g-s1-12544/biden-letter-withdraw-harris-endorsement;
"Biden Announces He's Stepping Down From Being Dems' Presidential Candidate" | Western Standard:
https://www.westernstandard.news/international/breaking-biden-announces-hes-stepping-down-from-being-dems-presidential-candidate/55754;
"Shawn Farash's Tweet on Harris" | Twitter: https://x.com/Shawn_Farash/status/1815089874095194458;
"Kamala Harris Receives Enough Delegate Support to Win Democrat Presidential Nomination" | LifeSiteNews:
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/kamala-harris-receives-enough-delegate-support-to-win-democrat-presidential-nomination;


Segment 3 - THE LIBS ARE LOSING IT!:
"UN Says Global Child Vaccination Rates Below Pre-Pandemic Levels" | Zero Hedge:
https://www.zerohedge.com/medical/un-says-global-child-vaccination-rates-below-pre-pandemic-levels;
"The Economist: WPATH Research on Trans Medicine Manipulated" | SEGM:
https://www.segm.org/The-Economist-WPATH-Research-Trans-Medicine-Manipulated;
"Vancouver Opioid Crisis: Drug Addiction in British Columbia, Canada" | The Telegraph:
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/global-health/climate-and-people/vancouver-opioid-crisis-drug-addiction-british-columbia-canada;
"Alberta Nurse Told Author Heather Hancock She Was Selfish for Not Getting MAID" | The Post Millennial:
https://thepostmillennial.com/alberta-nurse-told-author-heather-hancock-she-was-selfish-for-not-getting-maid?utm_content=;
"More Disabled Canadians Are Speaking Out Against Pressure to Choose Assisted Suicide" | LifeSiteNews:
https://www.lifesitenews.com/blogs/more-disabled-canadians-are-speaking-out-against-pressure-to-choose-assisted-suicide.

item.title: THE TRUMP ASSASSINATION ATTEMPT [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 19, 2024
On this special episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew DeBartolo and Matthew Hallick break down the Trump assassination attempt and the RNC 2024.

SEGMENT 1 - The Assassination Attempt:
"Assassination Attempt on Trump" | YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/embed/hXxeVrd58aA;
"Trump Shooting Incident" | YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/embed/6tReC8aNS0A;
"Trump Escorted Off Stage After Shots Fired at Pennsylvania Rally" | National Review:
https://www.nationalreview.com/news/trump-escorted-off-stage-after-shots-fired-at-pennsylvania-rally;
"Trump Releases Statement After Assassination Attempt" | Daily Wire: https://www.dailywire.com/news/trump-releases-statement-after-assassination-attempt;
"Secret Service Spotted Thomas Crooks Hunting Rangefinder Inside Trump Rally Three Hours Before Shooting" | Daily Mail: https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-13643655/Secret-Service-spotted-Thomas-Crooks-hunting-rangefinder-inside-Trump-rally-THREE-HOURS-shooting.html;
"Trump Shooter Thomas Matthew Crooks Seen at Rally an Hour Before Shooting in Shocking New Video" | Daily Mail: https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-13644511/Trump-shooter-Thomas-Matthew-Crooks-seen-rally-HOUR-shooting-shocking-new-video.html;

SEGMENT 2 - The Reaction:
"Shock of Trump Assassination Attempt Prompts World Leaders to Call for Unity" | National Post:
https://nationalpost.com/news/world/shock-of-trump-assassination-attempt-prompts-world-leaders-to-call-for-unity;
"CNN Initially Downplays Trump Assassination Attempt, Earning Conservative Lawmakers' Ire" | Fox News:
https://www.foxnews.com/politics/cnn-initially-downplays-trump-assassination-attempt-earning-conservative-lawmakers-ire;
"UBC Prof's X Post on Trump Shooting" | Toronto Sun: https://torontosun.com/news/donald-trump-shooting-ubc-prof-x-post-social-media/wcm/cf71ac4e-1198-4af0-97a5-76564d255ecb;
"Sick: Jack Black's Tenacious D Bandmate Kyle Gass Says 'Don't Miss Trump Next Time' During Australian Concert" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/sick-jack-blacks-tenacious-d-bandmate-kyle-gass-says-dont-miss-trump-next-time-during-australian-concert?s=09;

SEGMENT 3 - The RNC:
"Unwoke Thoughts' Reaction to Trump Assassination Attempt" | Twitter:
https://x.com/UnwokeThoughts/status/1813032805062136130;
"Keith Woods' Reaction to Trump Assassination Attempt" | Twitter:
https://x.com/KeithWoodsYT/status/1813046142571106458;
"Matt Walsh's Reaction to Trump Assassination Attempt" | Twitter:
https://x.com/MattWalshBlog/status/1813041088162083170;
"Trump's New GOP Platform a Massive Win for LGBT Americans" | Newsweek:
https://www.newsweek.com/trumps-new-gop-platform-massive-win-lgbt-americans-opinion-1924048;

item.title: MURDER: "It's NOT OK!" ft. Laura Klassen from Choice 4 2 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 16, 2024
On this special episode of Liberty Dispatch, host Andrew DeBartolo is joined by the founder and director of Choice 4 2, to talk about their latest animated video, sarcastically titled, "It's OK," about the use of aborted fetal remains in the use of vaccines. It's not ok that human life is devalued at both the beginning and end of life, yet it's all too normal in our nation. 

Episode Resources:
"It's Ok" Video | Choice 4 2: www.choice42.com/its-ok;
"It's OK to Say No to Assisted Suicide: Real Stories from the Frontline" | Christian Broadcasting Network UK:
https://www.cbruk.org/its_ok;
"Modern Molech Worship and Its Blood Sacrifice" | The Maple Theonomist: https://themapletheonomist.substack.com/p/modern-molech-worship-and-its-blood;
